cause.description:
Many consumers are unaware of everday abuse of televisons. Some are unaware that some of the shows that they watch everyday may ruin or crippler our viewing quality.Luckily today leading doctors have found a cure please if infected see your doctor for a prescription of Carrellon. Warning asked your doctor carrelon is for everyone and can cause some side effects of happiness and unrelenting popularity.
1. desperate houswives must be stoped
2. grey's anatomy must be stoped
3. lost must be stope
4. "the office" "scrubs" "south park" "family guy" must be watched
5. at all cost you must see "Get Smart" Summer 2008
cause.mission: stop the watching of lost, greys anatomy, and desperate housewives
cause.name: Stop television abuse
